typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as integer,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountryLookup
CasesAndDeathsSource filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterEuropeOnly
FilterEuropeOnly select(mapColumn(
		src_country = country,
		src_country_code = country_code,
		src_population = population,
		src_indicator = indicator,
		daily_count,
		src_reported_date = date,
		src_source = source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredFields
SelectRequiredFields pivot(groupBy(src_country,
		src_country_code,
		src_population,
		src_source,
		src_reported_date),
	pivotBy(src_indicator, ['confirmed cases', 'deaths']),
	count = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotCounts
PivotCounts, RenameLookupFields lookup(src_country == lkup_country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
CountryLookup select(mapColumn(
		lkup_country = country,
		lkup_country_code_2_digit = country_code_2_digit,
		lkup_country_code_3_digit = country_code_3_digit,
		lkup_continent = continent,
		lkup_population = population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameLookupFields
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		country = src_country,
		country_code_2_digit = lkup_country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit = lkup_country_code_3_digit,
		population = src_population,
		cases_count = {confirmed cases_count},
		deaths_count,
		reported_date = src_reported_date,
		source = src_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForSink
SelectForSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['cases_and_deaths.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CasesAndDeathsSink
